Dictionary.description: -- Definition -- A code list for the International Union for the Conservation of Nature classification scheme.

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a strict nature reserve under the IUCN classification scheme.
Definition.name: strictNatureReserve

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a wilderness area under the IUCN classification scheme.
Definition.name: wildernessArea

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a national park under the IUCN classification scheme.
Definition.name: nationalPark

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a habitat species management area under the IUCN classification scheme.
Definition.name: habitatSpeciesManagementArea

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a natural monument under the IUCN classification scheme.
Definition.name: naturalMonument

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a managed resource protected area under the IUCN classification scheme.
Definition.name: managedResourceProtectedArea

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a protected landscape or seascape under the IUCN classification scheme.
Definition.name: ProtectedLandscapeOrSeascape
